content:
Hey folks--

So I've been retooling my schedule and thinking a lot about my focus for the year, and one of the things I want to do is to focus hard on trait-related things. I've blocked out several chunks of my schedule for hacking and focused work (monday and friday afternoons, for example) and been talking to @Jack Huey about how we can organize things going forward.

As part of that, I have to admit that I am WAY behind on notifications here, so I just did a mark-all-as-read. I'm sorry =)
The name for this thread had my brain imagining way more dire situations :sweat_smile:
